[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thematic/core](./core.md) &gt; [MarkConfig](./core.markconfig.md)

## MarkConfig interface

Represents optional config for a theme mark, used at invocation time. For example, you may want to mutate the encoding for a rect using this config, based on runtime options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MarkConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [accessor?](./core.markconfig.accessor.md) |  | (datum: any) =&gt; string \| number | <i>(Optional)</i> Accessor to use for extracting encoding property for the item. |
|  [overrides?](./core.markconfig.overrides.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: any; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Direct overrides of mark properties with a fixed value, as opposed to scaled |
|  [scaleBindings?](./core.markconfig.scalebindings.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: { scale: (datum: any) =&gt; any; accessor?: (datum: any) =&gt; string \| number; }; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Scale binding map to apply for nodes rendered with this mark config. |
|  [selectionState?](./core.markconfig.selectionstate.md) |  | [SelectionState](./core.selectionstate.md) \| ((datum?: any) =&gt; [SelectionState](./core.selectionstate.md)<!-- -->) | <i>(Optional)</i> Selection state to apply for all nodes rendered with this mark config. A direct enum value can be supplied, which will apply to all nodes. Otherwise, a function can be supplied that will be invoked for each item, and should return a SelectionState for that item. |
